aboutpage.title: Who am I ?
aboutpage.part1: I'm David Mamulia, a front-end web developer with a sysadmin background, living in Kyiv with beautiful wife and cute jack russel terrier.
aboutpage.part2: I completed font-end developer basics course at PowerCode Academy in Kyiv, JavaScript advanced and ReactJS courses on Udemy.com, i love reading books and articles about programing, learning new skills and practicing what i have learnt already. I take every opportunity to learn and build projects.
aboutpage.part3: When i'm not working or learning, i like to do sport, listen to music, hiking in nature.
